org.netbeans.api.java.source.support

Class ProfileSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.java.source.support.ProfileSupport

  • public class ProfileSupport
extends Object
    Utility methods for JDK 8 Profiles.
    Since:
    0.119

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProfileSupport.Validation
      Kind of profile validation.
      static class  ProfileSupport.Violation
      Violation of profile.
      static interface  ProfileSupport.ViolationCollector
      Asynchronous callback for collecting the profile ProfileSupport.Violations.
      static interface  ProfileSupport.ViolationCollectorFactory
      Factory for ProfileSupport.ViolationCollector.

    • Method Detail

      • findProfileViolations

        public static void findProfileViolations(@NonNull
                                         SourceLevelQuery.Profile profileToCheck,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> bootClassPath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> compileClassPath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> sourcePath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Set<ProfileSupport.Validation> check,
                                         @NonNull
                                         ProfileSupport.ViolationCollectorFactory collectorFactory)
        Asynchronously finds the SourceLevelQuery.Profile violations in given source and classpath roots.
        Parameters:
        profileToCheck - the SourceLevelQuery.Profile to be verified
        bootClassPath - the boot classpath of JDK 8 platform to get the profile info from
        compileClassPath - the compile classpath to be validated
        sourcePath - the source path to be validated
        check - types of validation
        collectorFactory - the ProfileSupport.Violations collector
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the bootClassPath is not a valid JDK 8 boot classpath

      • findProfileViolations

        @NonNull
public static Collection<ProfileSupport.Violation> findProfileViolations(@NonNull
                                                                                  SourceLevelQuery.Profile profileToCheck,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  Iterable<URL> bootClassPath,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  Iterable<URL> compileClassPath,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  Iterable<URL> sourcePath,
                                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                                  Set<ProfileSupport.Validation> check)
        Synchronously finds the SourceLevelQuery.Profile violations in given source and classpath roots.
        Parameters:
        profileToCheck - the SourceLevelQuery.Profile to be verified
        bootClassPath - the boot classpath of JDK 8 platform to get the profile info from
        compileClassPath - the compile classpath to be validated
        sourcePath - the source path to be validated
        check - types of validation
        Returns:
        the Collection of found ProfileSupport.Violations
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the bootClassPath is not a valid JDK 8 boot classpath

      • findProfileViolations

        public static void findProfileViolations(@NonNull
                                         SourceLevelQuery.Profile profileToCheck,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> bootClassPath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> compileClassPath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Iterable<URL> sourcePath,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Set<ProfileSupport.Validation> check,
                                         @NonNull
                                         ProfileSupport.ViolationCollectorFactory collectorFactory,
                                         @NonNull
                                         Executor executor)
        Asynchronously finds the SourceLevelQuery.Profile violations in given source and classpath roots.
        Parameters:
        profileToCheck - the SourceLevelQuery.Profile to be verified
        bootClassPath - the boot classpath of JDK 8 platform to get the profile info from
        compileClassPath - the compile classpath to be validated
        sourcePath - the source path to be validated
        check - types of validation
        collectorFactory - the ProfileSupport.Violations collector
        executor - to use for the asynchronous operation, may have higher throughput
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the bootClassPath is not a valid JDK 8 boot classpath
